# Campaign

A marketing campaign.

## Properties

`object`


###  id
`string` _Required_




###  title
`string` _Required_

Human readable name of the campaign.


###  description
`string` 

Description of the campaign's intent.


###  startDate
`date` 

The intended start date of the campaign.



###  endDate
`date` 

The intended end date of the campaign.
